document.full_text: some 50 taliban insurgents, including one who said he was a taliban provincial leader, defected monday to the government in kandahar province, which has long been a militant stronghold.
document.title: asia: afghanistan: 50 taliban militants defect
lines_and_colors: some 50 taliban insurgents, including one who said he was a taliban provincial leader, defected monday to the government in kandahar province, which has long been a militant stronghold.
